text: Shadows of the Damned is an action-adventure video game developed by Grasshopper Manufacture and published by Electronic Arts. The game was made for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The game was released on June 21, 2011 in North America and on June 24, 2011 in Europe. ==Characters== * Garcia Hotspur - A demon hunter * Johnson - A demon that assists Garcia * Paula - Garcia's girlfriend * Fleming - The demon in charge of the underworld * Christopher - A half-human/demon hybrid ==Other websites== * Shadows of the Damned's Official website Category:2011 video games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Psychological horror games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about death Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games set in hell Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Shadows of the Damned
